      • getMaze

        public char[][] getMaze()
        Returns the maze structure.

      • generateMaze

        public void generateMaze(int N)
        Generates a new maze by summoning a new maze builder based on the size of the maze.
        Parameters:
        N - The size of the maze (0 for default, >6 for randomly generated mazes)

      • getFree

        public int[] getFree()
        Finds a free position in the maze. Used to place elements in a free position.
        Returns:
        Array with a free position

      • fillMaze

        public static char[][] fillMaze(char[][] maze,
                Hero h,
                java.util.ArrayList<Drake> d,
                Sword s)
        Fills a temporary maze with all the elements represented by chars to be printed either in CLI or GUI.
        Parameters:
        maze - Array containing the original maze containing only walls and paths.
        h - Hero in game.
        d - ArrayList containing dragons still in game.
        s - Sword in game
        Returns:
        Returns a temporary maze with all elements represented by individual chars.

      • BuildMaze

        public static void BuildMaze(java.util.ArrayList<Drake> d,
             Maze m,
             Hero h,
             Sword s,
             int N)
        Calls the necessary functions to build the correct maze according to the value of N (default maze if N equals 0 or random if different)
        Parameters:
        d - ArrayList containing dragons still in game
        m - Original game maze
        h - Hero in game
        s - Sword in game
        N - Maze size
